review: Virei gamer por causa desse jogo... esse jogo marcou minah vida! <3

Cell stage is funny, like the creature stage, but the games turns into an Age of Empires after tribal stage, this games is boring, very boring, i don't recommend to buy it, it's funny just in the beggining
Jogo ótimo recomendo 'pa' caramba véi, jogo ótimo, zerei com Jack, e quase com Abby, e vou comprar as DLC's tbm
muito bom, controle de territórios legais e guerras sensacionais
